title: One-Pan Autumn Chicken And Veggie Bake
directions: On a baking sheet, toss sweet potato, brussels sprouts, and sliced apples so they’re evenly distributed. Lay the chicken thighs on top.
Drizzle olive oil over the chicken, fruit, and veggies, season with salt and pepper, then sprinkle with garlic, rosemary, and thyme. Make sure to season the chicken on both sides.
Bake for 30 minutes, then finish off in the broiler for 5 - 10 minutes so the chicken skin gets golden brown and crispy.
